explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper mentions clustering of time series representations, which is a common technique in unsupervised learning.
explanations.clustering: The abstract explicitly states that the method involves clustering of time series representations.
explanations.feature representation: The paper discusses generating time series representations using Topological Data Analysis (TDA), which relates to feature representation.
explanations.representation learning: The use of TDA to generate representations of time series data aligns with the concept of representation learning.
